snippet.title: Exchange problem: NDR 5.2.1

snippet.title: Acronyms and Initialisms
snippet.description: Instead of a U.K.I., you'd be better off with a UKI which you can claim as your own invention. You can pronounce it as read, "yukey", in which case it would be an acronym. You can...
